languages.text: "Давно я не видела столь умиротворенной картины — ни яркого всплеска, ни пестрых красок... Лишь чистое, белое полотно".
"Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."
languages.original_text: "Давно я не видела столь умиротворенной картины — ни яркого всплеска, ни пестрых красок... Лишь чистое, белое полотно".

traits.locale_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."

traits.locale_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “如此安宁的景象，我已经很久都没见过这样的景象了。没有明亮的闪光，没有色彩的躁动……只有纯白色的画布。”
languages.original_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."

traits.locale_text: “如此安宁的景象，我已经很久都没见过这样的景象了。没有明亮的闪光，没有色彩的躁动……只有纯白色的画布。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Es la escena más pacífica que he visto en mucho tiempo. Sin destellos repentinos ni la mezcla de cientos de colores distintos... solo un lienzo blanco, puro».
languages.original_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."

traits.locale_text: «Es la escena más pacífica que he visto en mucho tiempo. Sin destellos repentinos ni la mezcla de cientos de colores distintos... solo un lienzo blanco, puro».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「こんな平穏な光景は、久しく見たことがない。まばゆい閃光もなく、色の乱れもなく…ただ真っ白なキャンバスは…」
languages.original_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな平穏な光景は、久しく見たことがない。まばゆい閃光もなく、色の乱れもなく…ただ真っ白なキャンバスは…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eine so friedliche Szene habe ich seit langer Zeit nicht mehr gesehen. Keine gleißenden Blitze, keine Orgie von Farben ... Nichts, als eine weiße Leinwand."
languages.original_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."

traits.locale_text: "Eine so friedliche Szene habe ich seit langer Zeit nicht mehr gesehen. Keine gleißenden Blitze, keine Orgie von Farben ... Nichts, als eine weiße Leinwand."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Voilà bien longtemps que je n'avais pas vu une scène aussi paisible. Aucun flash lumineux, pas d'explosion de couleurs... Juste une toile d'un blanc pur. »
languages.original_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà bien longtemps que je n'avais pas vu une scène aussi paisible. Aucun flash lumineux, pas d'explosion de couleurs... Juste une toile d'un blanc pur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Uzun zamandır bu kadar huzurlu bir manzaraya denk gelmemiştim. Parlak ışıklar yok, öne çıkmaya çalışan renkler yok. Sadece bembeyaz, saf bir tuval."
languages.original_text: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."

traits.locale_text: "Uzun zamandır bu kadar huzurlu bir manzaraya denk gelmemiştim. Parlak ışıklar yok, öne çıkmaya çalışan renkler yok. Sadece bembeyaz, saf bir tuval."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
